animeTitle: Falling For My Former Wife Season 2
otherNames: 复婚之战：总裁追妻路漫漫2
synopsis: A commercial marriage that makes two people victims. In the face of the provocations of the third wheel and the special concern of her friend's brother, Lu Nanyin will fight wits and courage, and also plays a good role as the "Wife of the Gu family". And Gu Xiaocheng was forced to marry Lu Nanyin, full of resentment and deep inside, and even fell hopelessly in love with her...
